Class Field

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.db.Field
public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
Metadata definition of a field.

  • Constructor Details

    • Field

      public Field​(java.lang.String name, Type type)
      Constructor assingning only the name and the type. Applicable to all types, those that accept a length are treated as no length limit, and for a decimal the scale is set to zero.
      Parameters:
      name - The name.
      type - The type.

    • Field

      public Field​(java.lang.String name, Type type, java.lang.Integer length)
      Constructor assingning the name, the type and the length. Applicable to DECIMAL, STRING and BINARY types.
      Parameters:
      name - The name.
      type - The type.
      length - The length.

    • Field

      public Field​(java.lang.String name, Type type, java.lang.Integer length, java.lang.Integer decimals)
      Constructor assingning the name, the type, length and decimals. Applicable to DECIMAL, STRING and BINARY types.
      Parameters:
      name - The name.
      type - The type.
      length - The length.
      decimals - The number of decimal places.
